General.Name: Elektro Redes S.A
General.Description: Elektro Redes S.A. engages in the distribution of electricity in Brazil. The company was formerly known as Elektro Eletricidade e Serviços S.A. and changed its name to Elektro Redes S.A. in August 2016. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Campinas, Brazil. Elektro Redes S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Iberdrola, S.A.
General.Address: Rua Ary Antenor de Souza, 321, Campinas, SP, Brazil, 13053-024
